errors.maintenance: This page is under maintenance. Please try again later or visit DepremYardim.com.

footer.banner: Disclosure: This website collects calls for help from various sources, including Twitter, Instagram, Whatsapp, and other websites. We refine this data to provide NGOs with a comprehensive open data platform in times of disaster.

site.depremyardim: To search and help earthquake victims.
site.afetbilgi: To get information on various disaster-related topics.
site.depremio: To help earthquake victims with supplies.
site.discord: To develop our projects and communicate with each other.
